id: get-me
title: "Get orgs and roles for authenticated user"

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get orgs and roles for authenticated user"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/{realm}/orgs/me"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get a list of all organizations that the user is a member and their roles in those organizations. Similar idea to /userinfo in OIDC.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"realm","description":"realm name (not id!)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"success","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"displayName":{"type":"string"},"url":{"type":"string"},"attributes":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}},"roles":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}},"title":"MyOrganizationRepresentation"},"title":"MyOrganizationsRepresentation"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
